posts.post_content:
The following better Old Judges are now available. If interested please email me at [url]oldjudge@gmail.com[/url].

Thanks--Jay

Orr script card--Catching pose: one of the scarcer Script cards, which is already a very scarce series. Clean back, beautiful front, slight ding in LR a corner---$1750
Stratton---Louisville. Gem card of scarcer Louisville player. Amazing image, clean back--$1050
Mascot--Willie Breslin card. Great image, but expertly rebacked--SOLD
Sowders--Kansas City. Scarcer player, beautiful  image, name of prior owner written lightly in pencil on back--$325
Marr-Columbus: nice image, scarcer team, small amount of light color glue adhering to back--$325

Welch and Gleason: very scarce two player card. There are a limited number of two player cards in the set with all being tough at a minimum. Nice image, ink stain in right border, small amount of superficial paper loss from scrapbook removal on back---$375
